price: [The angels say][40], “There is none among us but has a known station[41]:
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes:
[40] Refuting the disbelievers’ false claims about them.
 [41] In worshiping Allah and obeying Him in our assigned tasks.
